meanings.definition: Fill (something) again with a soft material.
meanings.sent1: She carefully restuffed the pillow with fluffy cotton.
meanings.sent2: After the dog tore the toy, she restuffed it with new stuffing.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear looked surprised when it was restuffed with fresh cotton.
meanings.sent4: The chair felt rejuvenated after being restuffed with soft padding.
meanings.sent5: The couch looked brand new after being restuffed with plush material.

meanings.definition: To fill (something) again with a filling material.
meanings.sent1: He decided to restuffed the sandwich with more cheese.
meanings.sent2: The baker restuffed the pastry with delicious cream.
meanings.sent3: The piñata was happy to be restuffed with candies.
meanings.sent4: The pillow felt like a treat after being restuffed with extra feathers.
meanings.sent5: The toy felt more exciting after being restuffed with colorful beads.

meanings.definition: To fill (something) again with a substance.
meanings.sent1: She had to restuffed the pen with ink to continue writing.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic restuffed the tire with air to fix the flat.
meanings.sent3: The balloon was surprised to be restuffed with helium.
meanings.sent4: The pillow felt lighter after being restuffed with air.
meanings.sent5: The toy car zoomed faster after being restuffed with energy.
